function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inefficient usage and risk behaviors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to acknowledge diverse levels of risk tolerance and perception","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of individual room control for cooling may lead to uneven temperature distribution and poor ventilation in certain areas, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai tools for monitoring social distancing compliance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modular construction strategy increasing the spread of covid-19 infection due to the movement and assembly of prefabricated components from different locations.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential privacy concerns arising from the use of surveillance and data extraction technologies in urban developments.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development of dashboard","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Varying infection and recovery trends in different states","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in humidity impact susceptibility to infection and viral particle deposition in the respiratory tract","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unexplored influence of socioeconomic attributes and environmental contexts on green space access","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 from real-life subjects involved in wearable technology experiments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"33% of works do not identify pandemic disruptions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding due to concentration of amenities leading to increased risk of virus transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anticipation of future business impact, structural and financial.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions and slowdown of supplies and labor availability in the building industry due to covid-19.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse health effects of uvgi on humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of non-car movements and micro-mobility may lead to challenges in maintaining hygiene and sanitation in public transportation systems, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate indoor and outdoor spaces for collective living areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital technology for public health communication","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging individual transportation over public transport","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in canada due to climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for revision of building codes and certification processes to address specific pandemic-related needs","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of hospital wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extremities in pollution and unhygienic levels resulting from human activities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate on the applicability and use of the wells-riley model for estimating infection risk during covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of backup energy risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of drug resistance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of quality research leading to challenges for medical staff","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased travel anxiety due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited funding capacity of cities may lead to reliance on ppps, which could introduce challenges in ensuring equity, affordability, and accessibility of smart city and safe city services for all residents.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity-based data transfer through nfc technology can lead to the spread of contagious diseases if the smartphones and badges are not properly sanitized.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large fraction of the population remains at risk of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unhygienic conditions in wet markets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in funding the european green
